directions: Heat chili in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Empty soup and milk into a small saucepan and heat through, stirring, until smooth and creamy.
Crush tortilla chips into bottom of individual serving bowls. When chili and soup are hot, scoop chili over chips and pour soup over chili. Sprinkle with chopped onion and serve.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed nacho cheese soup
title: Nacho Pie
